resources.string: In honor of the fact that my wife and I are expecting another baby. This quiz is to help you decide if you should have a child, or more children. This is intended to be light hearted; try not to take it too serious. Please start by typing your name in the box below.
When you see other people\'s kids do you think....
What size diapers will you need the first year?
No worries, it will be clean when they move out.
I can\'t stand this, burn it all down!
Being able to find your kids is important. How many kids do you see in this picture?
That\'s all the questions, click submit to get your result.
